ygData.subject: Re: Fw: Mystic Cloak Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, well, yes it works on KoS creatures as well.  Many halflings have banked in Oggok (the smallest race banking with the largest race) while hunting for
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, well, yes it works on KoS creatures as well. Many halflings have banked in Oggok
(the smallest race banking with the largest race) while hunting for their Ravenscale
armor that the rogues so much love.



Mark Muller wrote:

> > It's not a bug. It's a feature. Tell me, would you be ready to attack me
> if I were
> > sneaking behind your back? There is only 1 class that can purchase from
> anybody. That
> > is a rogue, with their sneak.
>
> Or a halfling anything :)
>
> Does it work with threatening or scowling creatures then?
>
> And no, I wouldn't ready to attack you if you were sneaking behind me...but
> I would certainly withdraw my offer to sell you my goods if I didn't like
> you :)
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be tolerated
